content: modern and simple c2c placemats in a stylish design they are crocheted in rainbow 8/4 which is available in a huge variety of colors that are perfect for interior design and decor a trendy leather strap adds the finishing touch to the placemats and make them look even more stylish happy crocheting materials - crochet hook size no c/2-d/3 depending on your gauge - rainbow cotton 8/4 3 crochet with double thread or one thread of rainbow cotton 8/8 4 - 3 93 inches leather strap 0 7 inches color nature - 1 rivit 0 11-0 24 inches - leather punch plier amount approx per placemat 6 94oz measurements approx 11 81 x 15 75 inches abbreviations **chain** chain **s** stitch **slip_stitch** slip_stitch **half_double_crochet** half_double_crochet 1 https //hobbii com/c2c-placemats utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=c2c-placemats&utm_term=swr 2 https //hobbii com/rainbow-cotton-8-4 utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=rainbow84&utm_term=swr 3 https //hobbii com/rainbow-cotton-8-4 utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=rainbow84&utm_term=swr 4 https //hobbii com/rainbow-cotton-8-8 utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=rainbow88&utm_term=swr
